thread.title: Saudi finance ministry sells 3.95 bln riyals of domestic sukuk

title: Saudi finance ministry sells 3.95 bln riyals of domestic sukuk
text:
May 27, 2018 / 6:17 AM / Updated 10 hours ago Saudi finance ministry sells 3.95 bln riyals of domestic sukuk Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
RIYADH, May 27 (Reuters) - Saudi Arabiaâ€™s finance ministry sold 3.95 billion riyals ($1.05 billion) of domestic sukuk in its monthly sale by re-opening an issue originally made last month, the ministry said.
It sold 3.35 billion riyals of five-year sukuk, 350 million riyals of seven-year and 250 million riyals of 10-year.
Last month, the ministry sold 5.0 billion riyals of domestic sukuk. (Reporting by Marwa Rashad; Editing by Alexander Smith)
